bill_title: transfer money from the health care trust fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to transfer money from the health care trust fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund ten million dollars ($10,000,000) or so much as may be available, from the health care trust fund established in S.D. Const., Art. XII, § 5, for the purpose of providing payments to providers of medicaid funded service through the general appropriations act. Section 2. This transfer shall be in addition to any amounts transferred from the health care trust fund pursuant to § 4-5-29.1. Section 3. This transfer shall not invade the principal balance of the health care trust fund as defined in § 4-5-29.1. Section 4. The state treasurer shall transfer the amount from the health care trust fund to the state general fund as soon as practicable after July 1, 2011. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
